item.title: By: Anne
item.dc:creator: Anne
item.description: It's okay :) if the source is added. Yes, i drew it some years ago when a friend was joking about a toast that was burnt at the barbecue. So i hope it's not understood as hostile!! ;) Nice Blog, by the way.

item.title: By: collidoscope berlin
item.dc:creator: collidoscope berlin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://collidoscopeberlin.local/2013/04/23/over-and-over/#comment-347">Anne</a>.
Hi Anne! Are you the "Toast mit Migrationshintergrund" creator? It's such a great shot :) Let us know if we can/should credit you in a particular way. Thanks for reading!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anne.

Hi Anne! Are you the “Toast mit Migrationshintergrund” creator? It’s such a great shot ðŸ™‚ Let us know if we can/should credit you in a particular way. Thanks for reading!
